definitions.definition: an act or means of sealing off a place to prevent goods or people from entering or leaving.
examples: there was a blockade of humanitarian aid
synonyms: siege; Morerarebesiegement "a naval blockade of the island"barricade
obstruction "they erected blockades in the streets"

definitions.definition: an obstruction of a physiological or mental function, especially of a biochemical receptor.
seal off (a place) to prevent goods or people from entering or leaving.
examples: barricade, block off, shut off, seal; Morebesiege, surround "rebels blockaded the capital"Morebesiege, surround rebels blockaded the capital
